ComicInfo.Summary: With our third story arc wrapped up, it's time for the next Tavern Tales issue. This time, the tales can't be contained in just 32 pages. This extra large issue is jammed with some of the biggest indy creators in the business alongside our Tavern Tales Contest Winners!
ComicInfo.Title: Son of Tavern Tales - Weekend at Burnie's; The Magic Bag; The Corran's Tears; Games People Play; Tavern Tails; Dues or Die!
ComicInfo.Writer: Aubrey Sitterson,Blair Butler,Charles Soule,J. Torres,John Layman,Justin Jordan
